name: flink
description: Flink is a self-hosted analytics tool for tracking link usage, referrers, and trends with privacy-first focus. It provides a clean dashboard and event tracking, suitable as alternative to Google Analytics.
features: Analytics: Privacy-first link tracking, Referrer monitoring, Trend analysis. Self-hosted analytics alternative.
Event Tracking: Monitor link usage. Detailed statistics.
Privacy-Focused: No third-party tracking. Your data only.
Real-Time: Live visitor tracking. Instant insights.
Custom Events: Track specific actions. Flexible monitoring.
Referrer Analysis: See traffic sources. Marketing insights.
Geographic Data: Track visitor locations. Regional insights.
Self-Hosted: Complete data ownership. Maximum privacy.
